text: E jenumanja achinawandu! Mun'jogopani M'mbuje gwenu jwawan'gumbile kuumila mwa mundu jumpempe (Adamu), ni jwagumbile kuumila mwa jwalakwejo wankwakwe (Hawa), ni jwajenesye kuumila mu wawiliwo achalume wajinji kwisa soni achakongwe, ni mun'jogopani Allah Jwankasawendanaga kupitila mu Jwalakwejo, ni (jogopani soni kata) maulongo ga kupagwana. Chisimu Allah pa jenumanja awele Nkung'unulila kusyene (jwaakuwa ali nkukalolechesya kalikose kankutenda)
